name: Interviewer / Research specialist
description:
We are Garage Eight, an international fintech company. Founded 10 years ago, we are now 350+ team members strong. We grow fast and are leading in several Asian regions. Over the past year, we have grown more than 3 times and opened 3 new offices in different countries worldwide.
We highly appreciate teamwork, engagement, creative approach, and professionalism, and we encourage those who want to grow as professionals.
We are looking for a team member who will be responsible for the work with influencers and celebrities (in order to increase the brand awareness in our key region).

Interviewer at Garage Eight:

  • Search for new contacts (experts and respondents);
  • Coordination of working conditions and interaction with experts and respondents;
  • Conducting interviews in English and Russian;

  • Conducting qualitative research;

  • Conducting research (mainly by interviews and surveys) in order to find out the best practices, insights and structure of competitors.

What we expect:

  • Ability to communicate / lead negotiations in english;
  • Fluent English;
  • Interview experience;
  • Systems thinking, the ability to identify the essence of the problem, compare facts and identify cause-and-effect relationships;
  • Competent written and oral speech;
  • Openness, sociability.

The advantage will be:

  • Experience in fintech.

What we offer:

  • Official contract in accordance with the local legislation;
  • Competitive salary;
  • Work within a team of professionals;
  • Possibility of professional growth and career progression;
  • Private health insurance;
  • Free tasty lunches in our office;
  • Reimbursement of different sport activities.
branded_description:
свобода быть собой

Garage Eight — международная продуктовая IT‑компания.

Строим систему высоконагруженных инвестиционных сервисов.

За 10+ лет на рынке, мы выросли из стартапа до компании с командой 350+ человек.

We are Garage Eight, an international fintech company. Founded 10 years ago, we are now 350+ team members strong. We grow fast and are leading in several Asian regions. Over the past year, we have grown more than 3 times and opened 3 new offices in different countries worldwide.
We highly appreciate teamwork, engagement, creative approach, and professionalism, and we encourage those who want to grow as professionals.
We are looking for a team member who will be responsible for the work with influencers and celebrities (in order to increase the brand awareness in our key region).

Interviewer at Garage Eight:

  • Search for new contacts (experts and respondents);
  • Coordination of working conditions and interaction with experts and respondents;
  • Conducting interviews in English and Russian;

  • Conducting qualitative research;

  • Conducting research (mainly by interviews and surveys) in order to find out the best practices, insights and structure of competitors.

What we expect:

  • Ability to communicate / lead negotiations in english;
  • Fluent English;
  • Interview experience;
  • Systems thinking, the ability to identify the essence of the problem, compare facts and identify cause-and-effect relationships;
  • Competent written and oral speech;
  • Openness, sociability.

The advantage will be:

  • Experience in fintech.

What we offer:

  • Official contract in accordance with the local legislation;
  • Competitive salary;
  • Work within a team of professionals;
  • Possibility of professional growth and career progression;
  • Private health insurance;
  • Free tasty lunches in our office;
  • Reimbursement of different sport activities.

Организуем рабочие процессы вокруг благополучия всех членов команды

Понимаем, что качественные продукты создаются мотивированными специалистами в безопасной среде, где каждый осознает свою роль в общем деле.
